item.description:
That's what Jody Marchand must do after her tragic ordeal...this is a fundraiser for healing.
read her story below...

When and Where:
Friday, October 1, 2010
6:00 - 10:00 pm
Radisson Hotel
10 Independence Drive
Chelmsford, MA 01824
Tickets: $10 each
Friends P Live Music
Raffles P Food
Tickets are available at the
Northeast Association of REALTORSÂ®
3 Courthouse Lane #9 Chelmsford
and The Owl Diner, 244 Appleton Street, Lowell
For more info, call 978-458-2901

In a tragic moment of domestic violence,
Jody Marchand was shot in her Westford
home by her husband, who also shot and
killed their daughter Olivia (aka Liv).
Jody miraculously survived the ordeal,
though the pain of the loss of her
beautiful, loving daughter has been
immeasurable. Her will to keep going and
her perseverance are an inspiration to
many of us and she is in need of physical
and spiritual healing.
Proceeds from this fundraiser benefit the
Live for Liv Foundation, established to
support Jody Marchand during her long
road to recovery.

I will have tickets for purchase at the meetups I attend, tomorrow at the Princeton Station, being the first night. You may also buy them at the NE Realtors office as noted above, but please let me know if you do, so I can get a count and maybe I can round up tables for us. I might call the office and ask them to keep a count, if they can, if you say your with meetup. The tickets will go fast.
This was a very sad occurrence, and I know I can count on my friends to support such a worthy cause, we go out together all the time anyway...what a great reason for us this time :)

I also have "Live for Liv" bracelets at $5 each.

You can also sponsor the event, check out the website at www.liveforliv.com

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Live for 'Liv' Benefit :)
